• Look: Your fur falls into green shades.
  • Poison Resistance: You are resistant to poison damage.
  • Spirit Casting: You can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.MB7NWQ5H11LSIVV7]{Caustic Needle} cantrip at will, dealing poison damage instead of acid when cast in this way. At 3rd level, you can cast the Ophidian Kiss spell once per long rest.
    You can use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence as your spellcasting attribute when casting spells this way.
    If you are a spellcaster, you can also add these spells to your spell list. They are always prepared and do not count against the spells you can prepare each day.
  • Element Stinger: Of all parts of a Zhier, the tail is the point most connected to its spirit element. You can strike with your stinger-like tail as a natural weapon. This weapon has both the Light and Finesse properties, and deals 1d4 poison damage as it injects a minor poison.
